author: liyin
msg: [master] Make ThriftResultSerializer use the correct library
Add `CuttingClassLoader` which allow cutting paths for loading clases
Reviewers: rshroff, manukranthk, liyintang, aaiyer, adela

author: liyin
msg: [master] Fix the problem of sunfire xml file
Some log was output by calling `Bytes.toString` instead of `Bytes.toStringBinary`, the former generates unpritable chars, which failed the Jenkins.
The diff change many (not all) usage of `toString` in `LOG` and `Exception` message composing.

author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-10808] Forward porting Leases and Histogram bug fixes to trunk.
Summary: This diff attempts to forward port the Leases and Histogram bug fixes back to trunk.
Test Plan: Run existing unit tests.

author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-9930] Bug fix in HConnectionManager isMeta function.
Summary: Catching an exception and finally removing the element from the isMeta stack.

Test Plan: Tested on tsh053. We should probably replace this stack using a boolean being passed throughout the interface/or a better design to identify the fact that we are looking for the meta table and that it needs to be prioritized.
